arts.ttl: Monday's League of Ireland Premier predictions including Derry City vs. Sligo Rovers
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League of Ireland Premier fixtures, including Derry City vs. Sligo Rovers.

arts.ttl: Ireland's road to recovery hits Athens cul de sac
arts.sum: The mistake by Kelleher, passing the ball straight to Petros Mantalos for Greece’s second, ended the contest as Ireland wrap up the October window with plenty of positives following the win in Finland, while also getting a timely reminder that there is still lots to work on ahead of next year’s World Cup qualifiers. Aside from an early Evan Ferguson chance, Greece pounded the Ireland rearguard throughout a one-sided opening half as the visitors were unable to cope with the fast-paced approach from their opponents who committed bodies forward to keep Hallgrimsson’s side pegged back inside their own half.

arts.ttl: Heimir Hallgrimsson urges Ireland to cut out errors after defeat in Greece
arts.sum: Keeper Caoimhin Kelleher’s error killed off hope of a fightback in Athens.

arts.ttl: Greece 2-0 Republic of Ireland: Caoimhin Kelleher makes error as Greeks maintain advantage over England
arts.sum: Greece remain three points ahead of England after four straight wins

arts.ttl: Republic of Ireland beaten by Greece as Baldock honoured in Athens
arts.sum: Caoimhin Kelleher went from hero to villain as the Republic of Ireland slipped to a 2-0 Nations League defeat in Greece.

arts.ttl: Caoimhin Kelleher makes late error as Ireland slip to defeat in Greece
arts.sum: Victory maintained the Greeks’ 100 per cent start to the competition and kept them three points ahead of England.

arts.ttl: England beats Finland 3-1 after recovering from shock Greece loss
arts.sum: After the shock 2-1 home loss to Greece on Thursday, goals from Jack Grealish, Trent Alexander-Arnold and Declan Rice secured victory in Helsinki. England got back to winning ways by beating Finland 3-1 in the Nations League on Sunday.

arts.ttl: England bounce back from Greece shock to claim much-needed win over Finland
arts.sum: Jack Grealish, Trent Alexander-Arnold and Declan Rice struck for Lee Carsley’s side in Helsinki.

arts.ttl: Ebosele dreaming of Ireland start for 'a long time'
arts.sum: Speaking exclusively to RTÉ Sport's Tony O'Donoghue, Ebosele said: "Before the game, [assistant manager John] O'Shea told me 'You could be the reason we win the game today, be ready'. Festy Ebosele is hoping to nail down a place in the Republic of Ireland team after making a game-changing cameo in the UEFA Nations League win over Finland.

arts.ttl: England starting XI vs Finland as Lee Carsley DROPS Jordan Pickford after Greece blunders
arts.sum: England's interim head coach Lee Carsley has made changes to his team following their 2-1 loss to Greece in midweek with captain Harry Kane among the players to come back in
